screen_desc: This is the Google Play Store page for the Lyft app. It shows the app's name, rating (3.9 stars from 296K reviews), download count (50M+), and a description of the app's features like safety and cost transparency. Below the app screenshots, it also includes an "Install" button for downloading the app. Additionally, there's a section about the app’s data safety practices.
